title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7902.2 - General distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7902.2 - General distribution

State Regulations
(a) At
any time during the month, the State Energy Office may order the general
distribution of part or all of a prime supplier's set-aside volume through the
prime supplier's normal distribution system in the State. (b) From time to time, the State Energy

Office may designate certain geographical areas within the State as suffering
from an intra-State supply imbalance. At any time during the month, the State

Energy Office may order some or all of the prime suppliers to make a general
distribution of part or all of their set-aside volumes through their normal
distribution systems to all or specified classes of trade in proportion to the
volumes normally supplied to them. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7902.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
